name: Beet Beats!
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2023

Theme: Roots!

It’s time to make some delicious soup in this rhythm game! Play as the beet as they gather vegetables, prep them, and finally cook them. Farm, chop, and stir to the beat to make the tastiest soup you possibly can!

Control: 

    Farm: Lane 1 - F, Lane 2 -G, Lane 3 - H

    Chopping: Chop - G, Peel - H

    Stir: Space Bar
